name: PutDown
description: Put down an item from hand to a specific location

parameters.name: target_key
parameters.description: Key of the location to put the item down (e.g., 'table', 'shelf', 'floor')

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Specific location or surface to place the item

requirements: Must have an item in hand
Must be able to place the item at that location
whenToUse: When you want to store an item you're holding at a specific location
When you want to clean up after using an item
When you want to temporarily place an item before passing it to someone else
